title: 2BD 2BA, Resident social lounge, Henderson NV
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station', '-Polished kitchen countertops', '-Wood-style plank flooring', '-Controlled-entry access', '-Resident social lounge', '-Separate dining area', '-Exterior storage available', '-Two-tone paint scheme Select units', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Oversized walk-in closets', '-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-Professional onsite management', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
